MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Bayview Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:17AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50AM on 20th January 2021
